inn1.comm: full and outside off, Chari opens the face of the bat and pushes it towards point
pitched further up on a fifth-stump line, no swing again, Chari presses forward and drives the ball to mid-off
good length and on a fourth-stump line, dabbed defensively into the covers on the front foot
full and swinging down the leg side, past the glance. Shin high carry to the keeper, moving to his left
good length on a fourth-stump line, holds its line, gets forward and pats it to extra cover again

shooter in the first over. Full and outside off, Chari shimmies out and throws his hands at a drive. But the ball winks at him and cheekily sneaks under the bat. Naughty ball, and it shows the nature of the surface. It does not bounce at all
even fuller on the stumps, punched out to mid-on
back of a length and angled into the hips, Chibhabha hangs back and picks it off to fine leg, running across to his left
shot. Back of a length and outside off, stands up tall and punches it crisply between the covers and point. This could have been a boundary on any other outfield. This one is slow following the rains
good length and outside off, stabbed back to the bowler, more off the inside half. The batsman simply aimed to force it. This is not the kind of the pitch to force the pace
overpitched and outside off, no swing, leans into the drive and crunches it straight to extra cover
back of a length on off, hangs back and fends the ball in front of mid-on
back of a length on off, the bat comes down at an angle, turned to square leg
straying into the pads, Kulasekara errs in line, deflected off the pads fine of diving short fine leg

an appeal for lbw, umpire Rusere shakes his head. Back of a length and this one seams back in off the surface and ends on off, cramping the batsman for room, pinging the back thigh. It was definitely bouncing over the stumps
Chri is twitchy. He shimmies out, checks his shot and pokes to extra cover
slanting down leg, wide

Chari gets off the mark after 10 balls. Half-volley outside off, 130.8ks, the batsman feats on it, cracking a drive to the left of extra-cover, through the vacant cover-point region. Slow outfield or not, this one skips happily away to the fence
Kulasekara pulls his length back, this skids onto the batsman. Defended
back of a length, leg-stump line, tucked off the hips to Lakmal at short fine leg
full, pitched outside off, and swings away from the right-hander. He is crease-bound as he chases a wild drive and misses
full and much closer to off, Chibhabha drives, but does not meet the pitch. Forced to mid-off
good length on a fifth or sixth-stump line, Chibhabha shows better judgement and leaves it be
short extra cover throws himself to his right to stop this front-foot drive from Chibhabha
length ball, might have been a cutter, stops on the batsman. He stays back and blunts it onto the surface
back of a length and outside off, punched out to point, maiden from Lakmal
hint of swing for Kulasekara, he can't control it. Slants it down leg again
full and swings back in, Chari inside-edges it onto his thigh pad
full and outside off, Chari drives on the up, short extra dives to his right, takes some pace off the ball, deflecting it to mid-off
full, starts outside off, seams away further. Chibhabha shows restraint and shoulders arms
full and outside off, no lateral shape now, Chibhabha takes it up on the up and thumps a drive through extra cover

umpire Rusere's finger goes up. This looks very adjacent, Kulasekara celebrates the wicket with a fast pump. Nice and full, swings back in a bit. Chibhabha is caught playing across the front pad and is trapped in front of middle. His head falls over too. It would have carried on to crash into middle and leg. Playing across the line is fraught with danger on these surfaces. Hitting leg, according to the tracker
back of a length on off, hangs back and fends it beside his feet
full and nibbles away outside off, slices a drive wide of backward point
good length and just a shade outside off, left alone
good length and on off or just outside off, punched solidly with a straight bat to mid-off
back of a length on off, punched solidly in front of mid-off
length and angling away around off from over the wicket, played back to the bowler
good length and angling away outside off, nothing doing from Ervine
extra cover flings to his left and intercepts the ball, Asela I think. Full and shapes away a bit outside off, driven through the line
back of a length on middle, dropped defensively to the covers
pitched up and outside off, driven on the front foot to mid-off
make it nine dots. Full on middle and leg, chipped to mid-on
length and swerving into the pads, nudges a single to square leg and gets off the mark after 10 balls
back of a length on off, Chari shuffles across, his head falls over. Played across in front of mid-on
some width, angling away further, and Ervine punishes the bad ball. Shortish and outside off, slapped away between backward point and the covers
good length and angled in on off, defended down the pitch
Lakmal dishes out another delicious delivery, and Ervine tucks into it. Overpitched and outside off, rasping drive through extra cover
back of a length and angled in, guided square through the off side
more round-arm than the previous ones. Full and angled in on off, Ervine moves forward and pushes it back to Lakmal
back of a length and veers in on the pads, happily clipped away through square leg, there is a man in the deep
good length and angling away, dabbed towards point with soft hands
full on off, plays across the line, whipping it off the toe end to midwicket
back of a length on the hips, diverted behind to short fine leg. Leg bye
full on middle, hangs back and prods it towards point off the outside half
back of a length and just a shade outside off, manipulated with the wrists past midwicket
back of a length and outside off, chopped down to third man, who is square
good length and floats outside off, cutter, Chari is early into a drive. Spooned in front of extra cover
another little offcutter outside off, stabbed to mid-on
back of a length and outside off, Chari slides the ball off the face to third man
back of a length and outside off, Shanaka draws an uppish punch. Dies in front of point
Shanaka draws another uppish shot. Full and stops on the batsman outside off, does not carry to extra cover diving to his right
good length and angled into the pads, picked away through square leg
tossed up outside off, holds its line, front-foot drive to long-off

Another chaotic mix-up, Chibhabha was the victim on Saturday. Chari is the victim here. There was never a run there. Never. Slid onto the leg stump from around the wicket, Chari dabs it a few feet to the right of short midwicket and scampers off. Ervine is not interested in chancing a single. Chari, however, is almost halfway down the pitch. He turns back, and dives desperately, but is caught miles short. Mendis ran across, grabbed the ball, and threw it flat to Dickwella, the keeper, who did the rest
floated up on middle, eased down to long-on with a straight bat
looped up outside off, driven down the ground again
shorter, flatter on the stumps, whipped through midwicket
non-turning offbreak outside off, driven to extra cover on the front foot
tossed on off, defended on the front foot
shorter and outside off, Raza goes back and punches it sweetly to extra-cover's left
full and straight, worked through midwicket
looped on off, drifts and turns a bit, catches the outside edge near the shoulder and sneaks to third man

oh dear, another mix-up. Tossed on the leg stump, nudged to square leg. Mendis runs across to his left from short midwicket and throws it to the keeper, who does not collect the ball cleanly. He was too eager to swipe the bails off. Run-out chance missed. Ervine set off, Raza responded with a couple of steps before stopping. Ervine has to undo his steps, he pulls out a full-length dive, and is aided by the keeper's lapse
flighted on middle and leg, paddled fine on the leg side for a double
full and floated outside off, left alone
full and swings away past the tram-line, off-side wide
good length on off, presses forward and pats the ball into the covers
skiddy delivery, full on off, defended
full and outside off, draws an expansive drive, and then swings to beat him
back of a length on the stumps, defended on the back foot
pitched up on off, played back to the bowler. Maiden
skids on with the arm, tucked to midwicket
dropped short and outside off, rocks back and slaps it to the left of deep cover on the back foot
short and wide outside off, cut away to deep cover
